body.p: Dear Sir I dislike to annoy you but I have a young friend who is just commencing the practice of Law at Greenville Mulanburg County who wishes to be commissioned Notary Public for Mulanburg Co I have known him long and well He is worthy, sober discreet and a reliable Union man. Should you commission him Notary, Please send His commission to Greenville Mulenburg Co Ky -- John R. Strange is the name of my friend -- We, I mean the the Union men all stand on the platform of March 18th 1863 -- The Radicals will Poll a small vote in this section of the state your course in the present crisis meets the approbation of all Union men in this section --

yours &C J. R. Thomas
Marion County

Muhlenburg Co
N. P
John R Strange
apptd
19th Apl/64
